page.title: 18SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES
page.content:
SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES
Most old people watch a lot of television.In the summer they seem to spend a lot of time gardening,but in the winter they do not go out so much, especially when it is icy.Many of them do not have cars but they can get a pass and travel for half fare on the bus.A lot of them have a dog or cat. A lot of ladies belong to the Womens' Institute. There is a meeting on the last Tuesday of each month.They enjoy watching demonstrations of things like flower arranging, or cake making ,and they have talks by experts on such things as antiques. In the summer ther are coach trips to Whitby and other places.
